item.description:
To sign up for this event, please visit the New Haven Photo Walk Page.

Date: Saturday, July 18, 2009
Location: Yale Center for British Art
Time: Orientation 4:30, Walk, 5-7 PM, Taft Bar, 7-? PM
Cost: FREE!

For the second year in a row, the NAPP (National Association of Photoshop Professionals) along with Scott Kelby (President of the NAPP) will be hosting a global Photo Walk.

47 countries, 44 US states, and 236 cities participated in this event last year. One of those 236 cities is New Haven, CT. It is free to sign up for this event and photos from this walk can be entered in Photo Walk contests and become eligible to win prizes!

There are 50 spots for this event this year. If you are interested you can read more about this event on Scott Kelby's Blog or the Photo Walk Website

To sign up for this event, please visit the New Haven Photo Walk Page. Please note that as of 7/6/09 this event is full. You must contact the Photo Walk Organizer in order to find out about any available spots or if a waiting list is available.

If you sign up, RSVP 'yes' on our page so we can find each other at the event!
item.name: NAPP - Second Annual Worldwide Photo Walk
